Name: Draw Slasher
About the game: Meet Hanzo. He’s a ninja. While he was training ‘out there’ the Pirate Monkey Zombies™ - stupid, ugly, smelly, rotten and disgusting creatures - kidnapped his family. Take control of his awesome blade and aid him in the quest to free them. You need just a mouse to play. LMB + draw a line to jump, dash, dodge, and slash. RMB to summon powerful Ninjutsu Techniques - super-efficient against the 'rottents'. FEATURES: • Unique mouse only controls • Story Mode • Challenges Mode • Endless Arcade: Survival and Gatekeeper Modes • Upgradeable Ninjutsu Techniques Cut, slice, snip, sever, chop, shear and trim hordes of Pirate Monkey Zombies™. And wear a helmet - you got only one brain!
